skillList.text: Understanding how to design systems is crucial for ensuring that applications last, scale effectively, and remain reliable. Once I grasped the importance of system design, I delved into studying it extensively. Recognizing that many contemporary applications operate in the cloud, I dedicated time to learning relevant cloud technologies, too. I hold Microsoft: Azure Solutions Architect Expert certification.

This is where everything comes together and the magic happens! With applications adopting more of a microservices setup, each part of the backend focuses on handling a specific job hence scripts shall be modular and compact. Throughout my professional journey, I've used Python with Django. I'm also at ease working with C++ for time critical tasks.

Regardless how powerful the magic is; having a user-friendly interface is crucial for any application. Although I've mostly dealt with backend systems, I also get the frontend side. I've got hands-on experience using JavaScript with TypeScript and React in my professional work.

All the previous skills matter in the end, but only if the product satisfies what the customer needs and fixes their issues. That's why grasping the customer's requirements correctly and providing a solution efficiently is an invaluable skill for any software engineer, even if it is often disregarded. I hold PSPO-I and PSM-I certifications from Scrum. Additionally, I have completed Software Product Management specialization.
